definition: April Fools' Day
to be stupid/to cheat or deceive/me or I (modest)
man/person/people/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]

sentences.english: Today is April 1. it April fool's day.
sentences.chinese: 今天是四月一號是愚人節。

sentences.english: You may laugh at a prank on April Fools' Day.
sentences.chinese: 你可能會因爲愚人節的一個惡作劇而發笑。

sentences.english: A:Do you know about All Fools' Day?
sentences.chinese: 你知道愚人節是怎麼回事檯球？

sentences.english: Every April Fool 's Day, Xiaoqiang would think of ways to trick others.
sentences.chinese: 小強每年愚人節都想着法子捉弄別人。

sentences.english: Will be that April Fool's Day , I want several well tomorrow , will persecute others conveniently method.
sentences.chinese: 明天就是愚人節，我要幾個好的，方便的整人方法。

sentences.english: Google has a tradition of perpetrating April Fools' Day hoaxes.
sentences.chinese: 谷歌有個在愚人節捉弄人的傳統。

sentences.english: I was hoaxed on the April Fools' Day.
sentences.chinese: 愚人節我被人涮了一把。

sentences.english: April Fool’s Day is one of the best days of the year.
sentences.chinese: 愚人節是一年中最好的日子之一。

sentences.english: Japan started early with the April 1st specialties, but the jokes continue.
sentences.chinese: 日本會首先出現愚人節特別網頁，但是玩笑還在繼續。

sentences.english: I wanted to tell him that today is April Fool's Day, but I could not spit one word.
sentences.chinese: 我想說今天是愚人節，卻一個字也沒說出來。

sentences.english: Actually I wanted to tell him that today was April Fool's Day, but I could not say it out.
sentences.chinese: 我想說今天是愚人節，卻一個字也沒說出來。

sentences.english: April Fool's Day is a "for-fun-only" observance.
sentences.chinese: 愚人節是一個“僅爲娛樂”的節日。

sentences.english: And of course, April Fool's Day was April's favorite day of the year.
sentences.chinese: 當然了，愚人節是艾普爾一年中最得意的一天。

sentences.english: Head to a website devoted to April Fool's Day.
sentences.chinese: 去一些愚人節專題網站逛逛。

sentences.english: So what kind of pranks do people paly on April Fool's Day?
sentences.chinese: 那麼在愚人節這天人們會搞什麼樣的惡作劇呢？

sentences.english: I guess they play a trick on the new employee every April first.
sentences.chinese: 我想每年的愚人節，同事都會戲弄一下新進員工吧。

definition: White Day
angry words/sth said in the moment of anger
Valentine's Day
to amuse oneself/to clown around/to provoke laughter
one's own wishful thinking
to feign/to pretend
to play a joke/to make fun of/to joke
practical joke/prank/to play a practical joke
to tell the truth/to tell it as it is
The End (appearing at the end of a movie etc)
to deceive/to cheat
a lie/untrue statement/misstatement
to start an engine/to boot up (a computer)/to press Ctrl-Alt-Delete/to begin shooting a film or TV show
babbling nonsense (idiom); crazy and unfounded ravings/double Dutch
to come to an agreement/to complete negotiations
to announce good news/to report success
